title: Information Technology-Based Teaching-Learning Style Analysis and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and general understanding of information technology
context.additional_context: Short-Intensive Course Applying Information Technology-Utilized Teaching-Learning Style Analysis Methods for Large-Scale Learners in Smartphone-Centric Limited-Technology Environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain three dimensions of IT-based teaching-learning styles: network utilization, collaborative methodologies, and independence levels
Learners can analyze IT-based teaching-learning styles in given educational scenarios
Learners can develop and implement IT-integrated teaching-learning plans through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
